mapper.select: select d.id from nt_sys_organization d left join nt_sys_user_org rd on d.id = rd.org_id where rd.user_id = #{userId} and d.id not in (select d.parent_id from nt_sys_organization d inner join nt_sys_user_org rd on d.id = rd.org_id and rd.user_id = #{userId}) order by d.parent_id, d.org_order
